website_summaries.verdict: It's is a middle-of-the-road model with middle-of-the-road quality.
pros: All major functions are easy to access via the control panel mounted between the bars
cons: At 240 lbs, it's relatively difficult to operate

customer_reviews.title: possibly overkill if you never get up to a foot of snow
customer_reviews.text: This thing is bigger and better than I was expecting. Granted, I have little experience with snow blowers. The ones I used previous were the smaller red ones with the 208cc engine. This thing is leagues above those. First time I used it, tried in on some packed, melted and re-frozen snow I thought it couldn't move. Went through it no problem, shooting it 40-50 ft. Not much this thing cannot handle. I live in Maine on top of a mountain, so I needed a strong one. This will work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Foster

customer_reviews.title: 6 uses = broken auger belt
customer_reviews.text: Have used this less than 6 times. Auger belt broke today when I needed it the most. 15" of heavy snow.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Lots of plastic parts that Break
customer_reviews.text: Junk!!! all plastic parts are breaking. So disappointed in quality... had to replace control console and chute base cracked.( See picture’s above) lots of money in repairs. Husquavana did not care to help in any way.. got parts on line..
customer_reviews.author: madeline bedard

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: garbage snowblower. the lct engine broke after one month. governor broke after one month and the carburetor went bad.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great looking machine!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice snow blower!! The controls for the spout are much handier than the cranks on on others I looked at. Ready for snow now!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was great, packaging was great. Put together easy, seems to be a really great machine. I haven't gotten to try it our yet, as i live in the mountains in Idaho and haven't gotten enough snow yet...WTH?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not enough horsepower.
customer_reviews.text: I had to bend the handles back into shape as the machine was not attached to the delivery pallet which caused damage to the handles. The machine has a hard time throwing snow in just 3" of dry snow. Not enough horsepower. It is inferior to the Craftsman machine I had for 13 winters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... winter and is turning out to be a VERY good investment. Very well built
customer_reviews.text: Have used this machine numerous times this winter and is turning out to be a VERY good investment. Very well built,easy to start, great on gas, plenty of power
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy N.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product. Only used it once so far. Worked great. Started on first pull. Only negative thing i could say is you can't adjust the throttle.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful run excellent .Easy to start .Little bit heavy but real toy for real boys
customer_reviews.author: ja

customer_reviews.title: Good for the heavier stuff. More than two inches
customer_reviews.text: The electric starter, although it has to be plugged in, saved m bacon a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. Beams

customer_reviews.title: Belt strength
customer_reviews.text: Broke the impeller belt, the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in good condition. Took about 45 mins to uncrate and assemble. Started right up. Just waiting for the first snow storm of winter
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Scott

customer_reviews.title: Seems well built
customer_reviews.text: NO snow...yet. But it was easy assymbly and started right off, I am sure it will do the job easily
customer_reviews.author: Delon

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, only used it once was expecting a typical ...
customer_reviews.text: Not bad,only used it once was expecting a typical bad winter here in the Northeast but I guess you could say we were lucky.I liked the snow throwing chute controls you can set it in any direction also the serrated blades on the auger are very nice to have.I don't like the handle controls however they are hard to squeeze and hold down for any length of time especially when it's cold out when you're using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ole' Vista

customer_reviews.title: While there was a great deal of snow (17")
customer_reviews.text: Auger belt broke after less than an hour of use. While there was a great deal of snow (17"), I was expecting a better product than this turned out to be.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Husband likes this. Quite large but worked well on our first little snow.
customer_reviews.author: Lila Spradling

customer_reviews.title: Shoot Directional Cables wrong ones and Auger stopped on first time out in 6 inches of snow!!
customer_reviews.text: USED ONCE had to load it in the truck and drive it to the Service Center because the shoot directional cables were the wrong ones AND the auger stopped working!!! Snow is coming and the guy said he'll get to it when he can. Of Course he'll have to order the parts!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Machine is well built and the handle adjustment is good for someone tall
customer_reviews.text: At this date the snow has not come. Machine is well built and the handle adjustment is good for someone tall. The only apparent draw back is it does not have the easy steering. I'll update after I have used it a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: William Marble

customer_reviews.title: Solid Snow Blower
customer_reviews.text: Purchased after learning that this set of Poulan blowers are made by Husqvarna, which also makes good blowers. Assembly was easy and I love that the tires both drive so you don't sit and spin one tire in tough conditions. The snow cute is slick with the lever controls for the180 direction and cute deflector. The chute does wiggle a bit due to the design, but doesn't impact snow removal. Only thing I didn't know was this engine doesn't have an idle or throttle feature. Once you start it, which has been easy, she runs full throttle.
customer_reviews.author: Jill K

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I have used mine for two years and have had many issues with it! I just had the cable break that controls the drive. It cost me 75.00 to have it fixed. The headlight and hand warmers have stopped working and the auger shoot base, made of cheap plastic, has broken completely. I still have issues with having it in gear but it wont move by itself as it slips. This thing is cheaply made. I will never buy a Poulan anything again. David in Fargo, ND
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Works good, except freezes up and cannot adjust chute
customer_reviews.text: We are on our second one in two weeks. Sears took back the first one as the chute cable freezes up right after getting it outside. Cannot adjust the level of how high to throw the snow. Second one is just the same. Works good, except freezes up and cannot adjust chute. Will take it back ONE MORE TIME and see what they can do.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa J. Ness

customer_reviews.title: awesome power!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered...stated 5-6 weeks free delivery. Showed up via tractor trailer within 3 weeks....Powerful and easy to use. AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: blade

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble and get running.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Added gas and it's started on second pull. It does have and does describe the electric start, but there was no power cord included in the box. I am planning to call the company and ask if that was a packaging oversight. Now I'll have to wait for some new snow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent speed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived way ahead of scheduled delivery. Exactly as described and easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Leino

customer_reviews.title: The chute swings back and forth like a fish and it impossible to control
customer_reviews.text: The chute swings back and forth like a fish and it impossible to control. Nice engine and blower but the chute ruins it. If amazon is able to contact Poulan with a fix that would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Went together easily and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Went together easily and looks great. I bought it because I've been using a Poulan 24HP mower for 15 years. Everything seems to work well with a dry test. It's a little soon for a final opinion--I'll have more to say AFTER it snows
customer_reviews.author: schapville

customer_reviews.title: Simply the worst plower out there!!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given ZERO star if that there was a choice. This is one of the worst snow throwers that I bought over the years. The plower stopped working the very same year that I purchased it. In dry condition the plower works fine, but never worked in real snow. Normally it stops after a few minutes running in wet condition. I repaired a couple of times. Worst, you don't get parts in your local stores. It was a total waste of nearly 1000 dollars. Their customer service is a joke!
customer_reviews.author: amp

product_meta.title: Poulan Pro PR270, 27 in. 254cc LCT Two-Stage Electric Start Snow Blower
product_meta.description: Poulan PRO PR270ES 27-Inch 254cc Two Stage Electric Start Snow thrower - 961920090. The Poulan Pro PR270ES two stage snow thrower features a 208cc Poulan Pro engine, electric start, 27-inch clearing path, 23-inch in-take height, improved performance ribbon augers, 180 degree remote chute rotation with remote deflector, 12-inch auger diameter, 15-inch x 5-inch tires with lug tread, comfort grip loop handles with single hand control, and adjustable handle height. Speeds are 6 Forward and 1 Reverse. 2 Year Limited Warranty and 4 Year Engine Warranty.
feature_bullets: 254 cc Poulan PRO engine; Transmission type: Friction Disc
Homeowner Warranty: 2 years; Gross Torque: 9.5 lb-ft

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars39 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
